import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get asset total cost"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/{assetId}/total-cost"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the total cost breakdown for an asset, including labor, parts, and itemized costs from related tickets. Use this for lifecycle cost analysis, replacement decisions, or budgeting reports.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetId** - Locate the asset via [POST /api/v1.0/assets/search](/docs/api/assets/keyword-search-assets) or [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-by-id).

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the asset record and capture `AssetId`.
2. [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}/total-cost](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-total-cost) to retrieve the cost rollup.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `assetId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Cost data retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing asset total cost data","properties":{"Item":{"type":"object","description":"Complete total cost breakdown for an asset including labor, parts, and itemized costs","properties":{"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the asset"},"TotalCostOfLabor":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","nullable":true,"description":"Total cost of labor for repairs and maintenance"},"TotalTimeOfLabor":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","nullable":true,"description":"Total time spent on labor in hours"},"TotalCostOfParts":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","nullable":true,"description":"Total cost of replacement parts"},"TotalCostToDate":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","nullable":true,"description":"Sum of labor and parts costs"},"Items":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"Individual cost item for an asset from a ticket","properties":{"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the ticket associated with this cost"},"Date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"Date of the activity"},"TotalCostAmount":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Total cost for this item"},"TimeAmount":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Time spent in hours"},"LaborAmount":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Labor cost component"},"PartsAmount":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Parts cost component"}},"title":"AssetCostItem"},"description":"Itemized breakdown of costs by ticket"}},"title":"AssetTotalCostFull"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer"}},"title":"AssetTotalCostResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"404":{"description":"Asset not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
